meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of a preceptor
meanings.sent1: The preceptorials guidance was invaluable to the students.
meanings.sent2: The students enjoyed the preceptorials approach to learning.
meanings.sent3: The preceptorials style of teaching made the class engaging.
meanings.sent4: Her preceptorials influence shaped the students' academic journey.
meanings.sent5: The preceptorials presence in the classroom was reassuring.

meanings.definition: a class or course taught by a preceptor
meanings.sent1: The preceptorials focused on advanced mathematics.
meanings.sent2: Students signed up for the preceptorials on literature.
meanings.sent3: The preceptorials on history had a full attendance.
meanings.sent4: The preceptorials on science sparked curiosity in the students.
meanings.sent5: Attending the preceptorials was a highlight of the week.

meanings.definition: the act of teaching or instructing by a preceptor
meanings.sent2: Students appreciated the preceptorials for their clarity.
meanings.sent3: The preceptorials made learning feel like a breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her preceptorials were known for their effectiveness.
meanings.sent5: The preceptorials inspired a love for learning in the students.
